name: Tappy Hoops
description:
Shoot baskets and show your friends who the real baller is!

Can you tap your way to the top?

* Score trick shots and combo for massive points
* Collect coins to unlock awesome new balls
* Travel the world & unlock unique courts

The best player will see their balls ignite with skill.

If you’re looking for hit new skill games, sports games or basketball dunk games, you will love Tappy Hoops!
